item.title: Liz Cheney Should Be Criminally Investigated For Her Corruption, Not Rewarded
item.description: The House Administration Subcommittee on Oversight has recommended that Liz Cheney face a criminal probe for 'witness tampering.'

item.title: Colorado School Administrator Fired Amid Child Pornography Allegations Found Dead

item.title: GOP Senators Who Hinder Confirmation Of Trump’s National Security Picks Put American Lives At Risk
item.description: Confirming Trump's national security picks is vital to preventing possible future attacks on America and its people.

item.title: An FBI That Targets Political Opponents Instead Of Terrorists Doesn’t Deserve To Lead New Orleans Investigation
item.description: The FBI wholly disqualified itself from leading investigations when it deemed anyone questioning the regime guilty of wrongthink.

item.title: Here’s Who Biden’s FBI Decided To Persecute Rather Than Hunt Down Real Terrorists
item.description: Imagine how much worse Wednesday's deadly event would have been had the FBI not taken dangerous grandmother's off the street?
